title: First Listen: 'Become Ocean' By John Luther Adams
teaser: NPR's classical producers Tom Huizenga and Anastasia Tsioulcas discuss a composition by U.S. composer John Luther Adams. "Become Ocean" is a symphonic piece that take its cues from the natural world.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
